metadata.funder:
CONCEPT-HF (PI20/00783) has been financed by the Instituto de Salud Carlos III (ISCIIII); (Spain) within the Health Research and Development Strategy (AES), and belongs to the CONCEPT project. CONCEPT project is a coordinated project led by the CONCEPT-STROKE. 
It is now integrated within the initiatives supported by the Health Outcomes-Oriented Cooperative Research Networks (RICORS) on Research Networks in Chronicity, Primary Care, and Health Promotion (RICAPPS). Grant Reference: RD21/0016/0016

metadata.description: Data model specification documenting both individual-level, sub-individual level and area-level data required to respond to the CONCEPT heart failure research question. The data model specification includes the cohort definition, individual-level and area-level variable specification including data dictionaries and crosswalks for semantic interoperable definition of certain variables (i.e. health status, clinical conditions and comorbidities - (def)). See below some of the conventions used to document this data model.

cohort.name: CONCEPT-IC
cohort.description: A cohort including all patients 18 years old or older with a hospital admission with a main diagnosis of heart failure within the period of study.
cohort.inclusion_criteria: Patients 18 years old or older with at least a hospital admission with a main diagnosis of heart failure within the period of study.
cohort.exclusion_criteria:
Patients younger than 18 years.
Patients with a secondary diagnosis of heart failure or a diagnosis of heart failure at primary care without any hospital admissions due to this during the period of study

variables.label: person_id
variables.description: Pseudoid of the person included in the cohort
variables.possible_data_source: Insurance registry or Health system users database
variables.observations_comments: Calculated/derived from person_id encryption or pseudonym generation algorithm

variables.label: age_nm
variables.description: Age of the person included in the cohort (at the time of entering the cohort)
variables.possible_data_source: Insurance registry or Health system users database

variables.label: sex_cd
variables.description: Sex of the person included in the cohort (at the time of entering the cohort)
variables.possible_data_source: Insurance registry or Health system users database

variables.label: socecon_lvl_cd
variables.description: Socioeconomic level of the person in the cohort (at the time of entering the cohort)
variables.possible_data_source: Insurance registry or Health system users database
variables.observations_comments: Only if information at individual level available following the categories in which the information is registered. Socio-economic level is covered by the node ResidenceArea in the DAG. See tab 'socecon_lvl_cd (def)' for more information.

variables.label: residence_area_cd
variables.description: Area of residence of the person included in the cohort (NUTS 3) (at the time of entering the cohort)
variables.possible_data_source: Insurance registry or Health system users database
variables.observations_comments: We assume a person maintains the same residence area during the whole period of analysis

variables.label: healthcare_area_cd
variables.description: Health care area of reference for the patient
variables.possible_data_source: Insurance registry or Health system users database

variables.label: primary_care_setting_cd
variables.description: Primary care setting of reference for the patient
variables.possible_data_source: Insurance registry or Health system users database

variables.label: diagnosis_code_cd
variables.description: ICD diagnosis code for selection into the heart failure cohort
variables.possible_data_source: Insurance registry or Health system users database

variables.label: exitus_dt
variables.description: Date of death of the person (if the person has died during the study period)
variables.possible_data_source: Insurance registry or Health system users database
variables.observations_comments: This date is required to prevent right censoring in patients dying after the first dose of the vaccine(s) without SARS-CoV-2 infection.

variables.label: exitus_bl
variables.description: Did the person die during the period of study
variables.possible_data_source: Insurance registry or Health system users database

variables.label: previous_heart_failure_bl
variables.description: The person included in the study has had previous admissions for heart failure in the 10 years prior
variables.possible_data_source: Insurance registry or Health system users database
variables.observations_comments: Previous hospitalization episodes with main diagnosis of heart failure

variables.possible_data_source: Insurance registry or Health system users database
variables.observations_comments: See crosswalk in 'cohort_definition'

variables.label: hospital_admission_dt
variables.description: Date of hospital admission
variables.possible_data_source: Insurance registry or Health system users database

variables.label: hospital_discharge_dt
variables.description: Date of hospital discharge
variables.possible_data_source: Insurance registry or Health system users database

variables.label: hospital_admission_type_cd
variables.description: Type of hospital admission
variables.possible_data_source: Insurance registry or Health system users database
variables.observations_comments: Options: 1 ('Urgencies/Emergency Room'), 2 ('Day Hospital'), 3 ('Outpatient Clinics'), 4 ('Others')

variables.label: hospital_discharge_type_cd
variables.description: Type of hospital discharge
variables.possible_data_source: Insurance registry or Health system users database
variables.observations_comments: Options: 1 ('Home'), 2 ('Transfer to another hospital'), 3 ('Voluntary discharge'), 4 ('Exitus'), 5 ('Transfer to a social-health center'), 8 ('Others'), 9 ('Unknown')

variables.label: hospital_discharge_service_cd
variables.description: Service of hospital discharge
variables.possible_data_source: Insurance registry or Health system users database
variables.observations_comments: Options: 1 ('Internal Medicine'), 2 ('Cardiology'), 3 ('Others')

variables.label: person_id

variables.observations_comments: Calculated/derived from person_id encryption or pseudonym generation algorithm

variables.possible_data_source: Insurance registry or Health system users database
variables.observations_comments: Options: primary_care_visit (medical doctors, nurses, other professionals); outpatient specialist visit (internal medicine or cardiology); hospital day care (medical doctor; nurse, other professionals); emergency care visit

variables.possible_data_source: Insurance registry or Health system users database

variables.possible_data_source: Insurance registry or Health system users database

variables.possible_data_source: Insurance registry or Health system users database

variables.description: ATC code of the relevant drug with an active outpatient prescription at entering the cohort
variables.possible_data_source: Electronic prescriptions

variables.label: prescription_start_dt
variables.description: date of first electronic prescription of the drug
variables.possible_data_source: Electronic prescriptions

variables.label: prescription_end_dt
variables.description: date of cessation of the electronic prescription of the drug
variables.possible_data_source: Electronic prescriptions

variables.label: first_dispensation_dt
variables.description: date of first dispensing of the drug in the pharmacy
variables.possible_data_source: Electronic prescriptions

variables.label: last_dispensation_dt
variables.description: date of last dispensing of the drug in the pharmacy
variables.possible_data_source: Electronic prescriptions

variables.label: person_id
variables.description: Pseudoid of the person included in the cohort
variables.possible_data_source: Insurance registry or Health system users database
variables.observations_comments: Calculated/derived from person_id encryption or pseudonym generation algorithm

variables.label: intervention_type_cd
variables.description: Type of the intervention (see types and definitions 'intervention_type_cd (def)'
variables.possible_data_source: Inhospital episode or primary care setting
variables.observations_comments: Transthoracic echocardiogram; {NT-proBNP, BNP} lab determinations both inpatient and outpatient; {vacuna gripe; vacuna pneumococo; vacuna SARS-CoV-2 }

variables.label: intervention_dt
variables.description: Date of the intervention
variables.possible_data_source: Inhospital episode or primary care setting
variables.observations_comments: date of the intervention

variables.label: echocardiogram_bl
variables.description: Echocardiogram during the study period
variables.possible_data_source: Insurance registry or Health system users database
variables.observations_comments: echocardiogram done during the study period

variables.label: electrocardiogram_bl
variables.description: Electrocardiogram during the study period
variables.possible_data_source: Insurance registry or Health system users database
variables.observations_comments: electrocardiogram done during the study period

variables.description: Chest x-ray during the study period
variables.possible_data_source: Insurance registry or Health system users database
variables.observations_comments: chest x-ray done during the study period

variables.label: nt-probnp_bl
variables.description: Determination of nt-proBNP during the study period
variables.possible_data_source: laboratory results
variables.observations_comments: nt-proBNP done durign the study period

variables.label: bnp_bl
variables.description: Determination of BNP during the study period
variables.possible_data_source: laboratory results
variables.observations_comments: BNP done durign the study period

variables.label: influenza_vaccination_bl
variables.description: The patient receives the influenza vaccination during the study period
variables.possible_data_source: Insurance registry or Health system users database
variables.observations_comments: the patient receives the influenza vaccine during the study period

variables.label: pneumococcal_vaccination_bl
variables.description: The patient receives the pneumococcal vaccination during the study period
variables.possible_data_source: Insurance registry or Health system users database
variables.observations_comments: the patient receives pneumococcal vaccine during the study period

variables.label: sars-cov2_vaccination_bl
variables.description: The patient receives the SARS-CoV2 vaccination during the study period
variables.possible_data_source: Insurance registry or Health system users database
variables.observations_comments: the patient receives SARS-Cov2 vaccine during the study period
